resources.string: Accept data collection, and reading and storing data on your phone?
This app would like to use Google Firebase Analytics to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with Google.
This app would like to use the Facebook SDK to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with Facebook/Meta.
This app would like to use Applovin to show you ads.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
This app would like to access the Google Advertising Identifier.\n\nThis involves accessing an identifier that can track your activity across apps.
This app would like to use Google Ads to show you ads.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
This app would like to use InMobi to show you ads.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
This app would like to use AppsFlyer to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
This app would like to use Flurry to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
Google Firebase Analytics (to understand your interactions with the app; sends data to Google)
Facebook SDK (to understand your interactions with the app; sends data to Facebook/Meta)
AppLovin (to show you ads; sends data to third-party companies)
Google Advertising Identifier (an identifier that can track your activity across apps)
Google Ads (to show you ads; sends data to third-party companies)
InMobi (to show you ads; sends data to third-party companies)
AppsFlyer (to understand your interactions with the app; sends data to third-party companies)
Flurry (to understand your interactions with the app; sends data to third-party companies)
Accept
Refuse
All
Selected
Privacy Policy
